abstract: Mathew Amoah (born 24 October 1980 in Tema) is a Ghanaian international striker who currently plays for Heracles Almelo in the Dutch Eredivisie.
comment: Mathew Amoah (born 24 October 1980 in Tema) is a Ghanaian international striker who currently plays for Heracles Almelo in the Dutch Eredivisie.
